A9P.SG.summary: IRSA Propiedades Comerciales S.A. operates as an investment arm of IRSA Inversiones y Representaciones S.A. Alto Palermo S.A. engages in the ownership, acquisition, development, leasing, management, and operation of shopping centers, as well as residential and commercial complexes in Argentina. As of June 30, 2007, it owned and operated ten shopping centers covering a total of 264,995 square meters in Argentina, including six in the Buenos Aires metropolitan area and four in the provinces of Cordoba, Mendoza, Salta, and Santa Fe; and a condominium called Torres de Abasto located in front of the Abasto Shopping Center in Buenos Aires. The company offers leases to retail tenants in its ten shopping centers; administration and maintenance of common areas; administration of contributions made by tenants to finance promotional efforts for the shopping centers; and parking lot services for visitors. The company also offers credit card consumer finance service, through the issuance of its Tarjeta Shopping and Tarjeta Shopping Metroshop credit cards, for consumers at shopping centers, hypermarkets, and street stores. It also engages in the development and sale of residential properties, and acquisition and sale of undeveloped parcels of land for future development. In addition, it engages in the development of condominiums associated with its shopping centers. The company was founded in 1889 and is headquartered in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

CTIO.BA.summary: Consultatio S.A. engages in the real estate development business in Argentina and internationally. It is involved in the development of urbanizations, residential buildings for sale, and corporate offices for sale and rental. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

TGLT.BA.summary: TGLT S.A. operates as a residential real estate development company. The company is developing 10 projects in Argentina and Uruguay with a sellable area of approximately 600,000 square meters. It serves high and medium income segments. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Palermo, Argentina.
